briefTitle: A Long Term Safety Study to Test the Combination of Aliskiren/ Amlodipine / Hydrochlorothiazide in Participants With Essential Hypertension
officialTitle: A 28 to 54-week, Open-label, Multicenter Study to Assess the Long-term Safety and Tolerability of the Combination of Aliskiren / Amlodipine / Hydrochlorothiazide in Patients With Essential Hypertension
summary: This study tested the safety of the combination of aliskiren/amlodipine/hydrochlorothiazide in participants with essential hypertension.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Any Adverse Events (AEs), Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) and Death
